achievements.name: TF_PLAY_GAME_EVERYCLASS
achievements.description: Play a complete round with every class.

achievements.name: TF_PLAY_GAME_EVERYMAP
achievements.description: Play a complete game on 2Fort, Dustbowl, Granary, Gravel Pit, Hydro, and Well (CP).

achievements.name: TF_GET_HEALPOINTS
achievements.description: Accumulate 25000 heal points as a Medic.

achievements.name: TF_BURN_PLAYERSINMINIMUMTIME
achievements.description: Set five enemies on fire in 30 seconds.

achievements.name: TF_GET_TURRETKILLS
achievements.description: Accumulate 10 sentry gun kills with a single sentry.

achievements.name: TF_KILL_NEMESIS
achievements.description: Get five revenge kills.

achievements.name: TF_GET_CONSECUTIVEKILLS_NODEATHS
achievements.description: Get five kills in a row without dying.

achievements.name: TF_GET_HEALED_BYENEMY
achievements.description: Trick an opposing Medic into healing you.

achievements.name: TF_PLAY_GAME_FRIENDSONLY
achievements.description: Play in a game with 7 or more players from your Friends list.

achievements.name: TF_WIN_MULTIPLEGAMES
achievements.description: Win 20 games.

achievements.name: TF_GET_MULTIPLEKILLS
achievements.description: Accumulate 1000 total kills.

achievements.name: TF_GET_HEADSHOTS
achievements.description: Get 25 headshots as a Sniper.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_TOP_SCOREBOARD
achievements.description: Play a full round without killing any enemies, and score the highest on a team of 6 or more players.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_HEAL_UNDER_FIRE
achievements.description: Heal a teammate who's taking fire from 4 enemies at once.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_SIMUL_CHARGE
achievements.description: Work with 2 other Medics to deploy 3 simultaneous berCharges.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_SETUP_CHARGE
achievements.description: Have an berCharge ready before the Setup phase ends.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_RAPID_CHARGE
achievements.description: Deploy 3 berCharges in less than 5 minutes, and assist in 5 kills during that time.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_COUNTER_CHARGE
achievements.description: Deploy an berCharge within 8 seconds of a nearby enemy Medic deploying his.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_SWITCH_TO_MEDIC
achievements.description: In a team with no Medics, be the first person to switch to Medic after a teammate calls for 'Medic!', and then heal 500 health.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_SAVE_TEAMMATE
achievements.description: Deploy an berCharge on a teammate less than a second before they're hit by a critical explosive.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_CHARGE_BLOCKER
achievements.description: Block the enemy from capturing a control point with an berCharged teammate.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ASSIST_MEDIC
achievements.description: Assist a fellow Medic in killing 3 enemies in a single life.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_SYRINGE_SCOUTS
achievements.displayName: Does It Hurt When I Do This?
achievements.description: Kill 50 Scouts with your syringe gun.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_BONESAW_MEDICS
achievements.description: Kill 10 Medics with your bone saw.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ASSIST_HEAVY_LONG
achievements.description: Assist a Heavy in killing 10 enemies, where neither of you die.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ASSIST_SCOUT
achievements.description: Assist in killing 3 enemies with a single berCharge on a Scout.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ASSIST_PYRO
achievements.description: Assist in burning 5 enemies with a single berCharge on a Pyro.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ASSIST_HEAVY
achievements.description: Assist in punching 2 enemies with a single berCharge on a Heavy.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ASSIST_DEMOMAN
achievements.description: Assist in destroying 5 enemy Engineer buildings with a single berCharge on a Demoman.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_HEAL_ENGINEER
achievements.description: Heal an Engineer as he repairs his sentry gun while it's under enemy fire.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_ASSIST_CAPTURER
achievements.description: Assist in killing 3 enemies on an enemy control point, in a single life.

achievements.name: TF_MEDIC_HEAL_CALLERS
achievements.description: Heal 200 teammates after they've called for 'Medic!'.

achievements.name: TF_WIN_2FORT_NOENEMYCAPS
achievements.description: Win 2Fort with a shutout.

achievements.name: TF_WIN_WELL_MINIMUMTIME
achievements.description: Win Well in 5 minutes or less.

achievements.name: TF_WIN_HYDRO_NOENEMYCAPS

achievements.name: TF_WIN_DUSTBOWL_NOENEMYCAPS

achievements.name: TF_WIN_GRAVELPIT_NOENEMYCAPS

achievements.description: Play in a game with five or more players from your Friends list.

achievements.description: Be part of a team that wins within two minutes.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_FOUNDRY_WIN_ROUNDS
achievements.description: Win 137 Rounds.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_FOUNDRY_FAST_FINAL_CAP
achievements.description: Capture the final control point within five seconds of your team capturing the previous control point.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_FOUNDRY_TELEPORT_AND_CAP
achievements.description: Capture a control point within 12 seconds after exiting a teleporter.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_FOUNDRY_PUSH_INTO_CAULDRON
achievements.description: Kill a player by pushing them into the cauldron fire.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_FOUNDRY_PUSH_BACK_AND_WIN
achievements.description: Win a round in which the enemy team has attempted to capture your final control point.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_FOUNDRY_PLAY_EACH_CLASS
achievements.description: Get one or more kills as all nine classes in one round.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_FOUNDRY_KILL_ENEMY_ON_ROOF
achievements.description: Kill two people on the roof of the center control point in a single life.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_FOUNDRY_BACK_AND_FORTH_BATTLE
achievements.description: Play through a back-and-forth battle for 15 control point captures.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_FOUNDRY_ACHIEVE_PROGRESS1
achievements.description: Achieve 7 of the achievements in the Foundry pack.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_COMPLETE_POP_FILE
achievements.description: Complete all waves successfully in a mission.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_DOOMSDAY_SOLO_CAPTURE
achievements.description: Pick up the Australium from its home position and capture it without dropping it.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_DOOMSDAY_PLAY_GAME_FRIENDS
achievements.description: Play in a game with 5 or more players from your Friends list.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_DOOMSDAY_WIN_ROUNDS
achievements.description: Win 138 Rounds.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_DOOMSDAY_PLAY_EACH_CLASS
achievements.description: Launch the rocket as all 9 classes.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_DOOMSDAY_KILL_ENEMIES_ON_ELEVATOR
achievements.description: Kill 3 players riding the elevator within 10 seconds.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_DOOMSDAY_PUSH_BACK_AND_WIN
achievements.description: Win a round after the enemy team has opened the rocket lid.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_DOOMSDAY_KILL_CARRIERS
achievements.description: Kill 6 enemies carrying the Australium during the same round.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_DOOMSDAY_RIDE_THE_ELEVATOR
achievements.description: Win a round with at least 5 teammates on the elevator.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_DOOMSDAY_DENY_NEUTRAL_PICKUP
achievements.description: Kill an enemy within the broken crate area while they attempt to pick up the neutral Australium.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_DOOMSDAY_PUSH_INTO_EXHAUST
achievements.description: Push a player into the rocket's exhaust path at the end of the round.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_DOOMSDAY_DEFEND_CARRIER
achievements.description: Kill an enemy who has damaged the Australium carrier in the last 3 seconds.

achievements.name: TF_MAPS_DOOMSDAY_ACHIEVE_PROGRESS1
achievements.description: Achieve 7 of the achievements in the Doomsday pack.

achievements.name: TF_KILL_BALLOONICORN_OWNERS
achievements.description: Kill 79 enemies who have Balloonicorn pets.

achievements.name: TF_MULTIPLE_BFF
achievements.description: Have 2 BEST FRIENDS at the same time.

achievements.name: TF_TEAM_PYROVISION
achievements.description: Have 6 teammates using Pyrovision at the same time.

achievements.name: TF_DOMINATE_FOR_GOGGLES
achievements.description: Dominate a player using the Pyrovision Goggles and earn your own pair!

achievements.name: TF_PYRO_IGNITE_WITH_RAINBOW
achievements.description: Ignite 3 enemy players using your Rainblower taunt.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_EARN_MONEY_BONUS
achievements.description: Earn a credit bonus at the end of a wave.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_ADVANCED_EARN_ALL_BONUSES
achievements.description: Earn all credit bonuses in an advanced difficulty mission.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_PICKUP_MONEY_ABOUT_TO_EXPIRE
achievements.description: Pick up a credit pile that is about to expire.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_COLLECT_MONEY_GRIND
achievements.description: Collect 1,000,000 credits in your career.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_PLAY_GAME_FRIENDS
achievements.description: Complete a mission with 5 people on your Friends List.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_PLAY_EACH_CLASS
achievements.description: Play an entire mission as a single class, and do this for every class.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_DESTROY_TWO_TANKS
achievements.description: Destroy two tanks within 5 seconds of each other.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_DESTROY_TANK_WHILE_DEPLOYING
achievements.description: Destroy the tank during the final seconds of the bomb being deployed.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_DESTROY_TANK_QUICKLY
achievements.description: Destroy a tank within 20 seconds of its arrival.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_DEFEND_CAP
achievements.description: During a wave, defend the hatch 10 times from robots about to deliver a bomb.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_KILL_BOMB_CARRIERS
achievements.description: In a single wave, kill 15 bomb-carrying robots in a row before they level up.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_COMPLETE_WAVE_WITHOUT_DYING
achievements.description: Defeat a wave in an advanced difficulty mission without dying once.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_COMPLETE_TOUR
achievements.description: Complete the Crash Course, Doe's Drill, and Mann-euvers missions.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_USE_TELEPORT_BOTTLE
achievements.description: Use a canteen charged with 'Teleport to Spawn' and then kill the bomb carrier within 5 seconds.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_USE_CRIT_BOTTLE
achievements.description: Use a canteen charged with 'Crit Boost' to destroy a giant robot.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_USE_UBER_BOTTLE
achievements.description: Use a canteen charged with 'berCharge' to destroy 15 robots.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_USE_BUILD_BOTTLE
achievements.description: During a wave, use a canteen charged with 'Instant Building Upgrade' to build a new sentry gun within 3 seconds of your previous sentry gun's destruction.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_USE_AMMO_BOTTLE
achievements.description: During a wave, use a canteen charged with 'Ammo Reload' to refill an empty weapon slot.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_MAX_PRIMARY_UPGRADES
achievements.description: Max out all primary weapon upgrades.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_MAX_PLAYER_RESISTANCES
achievements.description: Max out all resistances on a single class.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_NO_ALARMS_IN_FINAL_WAVE
achievements.description: Prevent the bomb from ever reaching an alarm zone during the final wave of an advanced difficulty mission.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_KILL_MEDICS_CHARGED
achievements.description: Kill 5 Medics that are ready to deploy an berCharge in a wave.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_KILL_ROBOT_GRIND
achievements.description: Destroy 100,000 robots.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_KILL_ROBOT_MEGA_GRIND
achievements.description: Destroy 1,000,000 robots.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_KILL_SENTRY_BUSTER
achievements.description: Destroy a sentry buster before it reaches its target.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_SPY_SAP_ROBOTS
achievements.description: As a Spy, sap 10 robots at once.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_SOLDIER_BUFF_TEAM
achievements.description: Buff 4 or more teammates as a Soldier at the same time in a single wave.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_HEAVY_RAGE_PUSH_DEPLOYING_ROBOT
achievements.description: During a wave, use rage as a Heavy to push a robot about to deliver the bomb.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_MEDIC_SHARE_BOTTLES
achievements.description: As a Medic, share your canteen 5 times in a single wave.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_DEMO_GROUP_KILL
achievements.description: As a Demoman, kill 10 robots in a single detonation.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_SCOUT_MARK_FOR_DEATH
achievements.description: As a Scout, use the Sandman to mark 15 robots for death in a single wave.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_SNIPER_KILL_GROUP
achievements.description: As a Sniper, kill 4 enemies simultaneously.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_PYRO_BOMB_RESET
achievements.description: As a Pyro, reset the bomb 3 times in a single wave.

achievements.name: TF_MVM_ENGINEER_ESCAPE_SENTRY_BUSTER
achievements.description: As an Engineer, escape with your sentry as a sentry buster is about to detonate.

achievements.name: TF_HALLOWEEN_MERASMUS_COLLECT_LOOT
achievements.description: Get to Skull Island and claim your reward!

achievements.name: TF_HALLOWEEN_MERASMUS_KILL
achievements.description: Kill MERASMUS!

achievements.name: TF_HALLOWEEN_HELLTOWER_RARE_SPELL
achievements.description: Get and use a rare spell

achievements.name: TF_HALLOWEEN_HELLTOWER_WIN_ROUNDS
achievements.description: Win 142 rounds

achievements.name: TF_HALLOWEEN_HELLTOWER_ENVIRONMENTAL_KILLS
achievements.description: Perform 17 environmental kills in Hell

achievements.name: TF_HALLOWEEN_HELLTOWER_SKELETON_GRIND
achievements.description: Kill 99 skeletons

achievements.name: TF_HALLOWEEN_HELLTOWER_KILL_GRIND
achievements.description: Use spells to kill 25 players

achievements.name: TF_HALLOWEEN_HELLTOWER_MILESTONE
achievements.description: Earn 4 of the Helltower achievements

achievements.name: TF_HALLOWEEN_HELLTOWER_SKULL_ISLAND_REWARD
achievements.description: Get the loot from Skull Island in Hell

achievements.name: TF_HALLOWEEN_HELLTOWER_KILL_BROTHERS
achievements.description: Send Redmond/Blutarch to Hell 10 times
